header.HexAddressTooltip: Current ETH Address. Others can send CKB to this address using wallets that support pw-lock.
header.ckbAddressTooltip: A Transit Address. When you receive CKB from exchanges or CKB wallets with no full address support, please use this address.

result.crossMeta: You will receive additional 179 CKB given free by Crosschain Relayer.
result.orderMeta: Placing this Order will lock your additional {{amount}} CKB in the Order.

trade.insufficientAmount: Insufficient CKB balance. Please keep at least 179.1 CKB in your wallet.

trade.lessThanMax: Your pay amount should be less than MAX amount
trade.miniumReceive: The receive value is too small
trade.greaterThanZero: The value must be bigger than 0
trade.unEffectiveNumber: Please fill in a valid number

trade.executionFeeDesc: This fee was paid to the dealmaker who matches your order
trade.transactionFeeDesc: This fee was paid to the CKB miner
